text: Clad in jade armour, these elite Asur swordsmen have sworn to defend the Gates of Calith from all who threaten them.
Clad in jade armour, these elite Asur swordsmen have sworn to defend the Gates of Calith from all who threaten them.
Torinubar has stood guard over the Gates of Calith for centuries now, using his mastery in Kineticism to stop any would-be invaders before they even touch him.
